医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
社交媒体和互联网：学龄儿童家长最关心的问题随着孩子们重返校园，有两个问题在家长的关注中越来越重要：社交媒体和互联网在孩子生活中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Social-media-and-the-internet-Top-concerns-for-parents-of-school-age-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Social-media-and-the-internet-Top-concerns-for-parents-of-school-age-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7306ea89-91e0-4c45-a857-ca17f407dd66 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 23:14:00 -0400 Social media and the internet: Top concerns for parents of school-age children
新型有机电极可能彻底改变电疗隆德大学和哥德堡大学的研究人员成功开发出了可以无缝集成到生物系统中的临时有机电极。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-organic-electrodes-could-revolutionize-electrictherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-organic-electrodes-could-revolutionize-electrictherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88b49834-dfb1-44d3-b15d-b50c18c8900a Mon, 21 Aug 2023 23:11:15 -0400 New organic electrodes could revolutionize electrotherapy
研究发现 Omicron 感染可能会增加再感染的风险麦克马斯特大学的研究人员发现，第一波 Omicron 疫情期间的感染并没有赋予他们对未来感染的免疫力，而是让他们研究的老年人在第二波 Omicron 疫情期间更容易再次感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Omicron-infection-may-increase-risk-of-reinfection-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Omicron-infection-may-increase-risk-of-reinfection-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4b743f3-97dd-409c-9e8f-a0fa06e82631 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 23:07:00 -0400 Omicron infection may increase risk of reinfection, study finds
科学家绘制了蠕虫大脑如何编码行为的图谱为了了解大脑活动和行为之间的完整关系，科学家们需要一种方法来绘制整个大脑中所有神经元的这种关系——这是迄今为止无法克服的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Scientists-map-how-worm-b​​rain-encodes-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Scientists-map-how-worm-b​​rain-encodes-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba827c65-19d8-4888-8dbf-bb1fae07fd4b Mon, 21 Aug 2023 23:06:00 -0400 Scientists map how worm brain encodes behavior
新加坡国立大学研究人员利用大自然的设计开发新型压力传感器新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 的研究人员开发了一种新型气动弹性压力传感器，称为“eAir”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/NUS-researchers-harness-natures-design-to-develop-novel-Pressure-sensor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/NUS-researchers-harness-natures-design-to-develop-novel-Pressure-sensor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10f50363-161e-481e-baba-4f1862a59a87 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 23:00:00 -0400 NUS researchers harness nature's design to develop novel pressure sensor
研究估计，到 2050 年，将有近 10 亿人可能患有骨关节炎一项新的研究预计，到 2050 年，将有近 10 亿人患有骨关节炎，这是最常见的关节炎形式。目前，30 岁及以上的人中有 15% 患有骨关节炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Nearly-1-billion-people-likely-to-live-with-osteoarthritis-by-2050-study-estimates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Nearly-1-billion-people-likely-to-live-with-osteoarthritis-by-2050-study-estimates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=670601a8-6a62-4ade-bc1b-1e4ab5b58d20 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 22:54:38 -0400 Nearly 1 billion people likely to live with osteoarthritis by 2050, study estimates
研究确定了子宫内膜癌患者潜在的新治疗选择亨斯曼癌症研究所的研究人员为子宫内膜癌患者确定了潜在的新治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Study-identizes-pottial-new-treatment-options-for-people-with-endometrial-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Study-identizes-pottial-new-treatment-options-for-people-with-endometrial-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b789d59d-30fc-45ed-ac2a-b0b13fb7eb6a Mon, 21 Aug 2023 22:40:33 -0400 Study identifies potential new treatment options for people with endometrial cancer
MIND 研究所获得 470 万美元用于研究社区机构中以儿童为中心的自闭症干预措施加州大学戴维斯分校 MIND 研究所的研究人员从美国国立心理健康研究所获得了 470 万美元的五年期资助，用于研究社区机构中以儿童为中心的自闭症干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/MIND-Institute-receives-2447-million-to-study-child-focused-autism-intervention-in-community-agcies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/MIND-Institute-receives-2447-million-to-study-child-focused-autism-intervention-in-community-agcies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9d87107-c0af-4578-9c17-78b257271378 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 22:34:56 -0400 MIND Institute receives $4.7 million to study child-focused autism intervention in community agencies
研究揭示黑水虻幼虫油在炎症相关病症中的抗炎作用新研究揭示了黑水虻幼虫 (BSFL) 油的抗炎功效，揭示了其缓解溃疡性结肠炎等炎症的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Study-reveals-anti-炎症-power-of-Black-Soldier-Fly-Larvae-oil-in-炎症-相关-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Study-reveals-anti-炎症-power-of-Black-Soldier-Fly-Larvae-oil-in-炎症-相关-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6544d10-219c-42a6-9b4d-a900c0961649 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 22:31:28 -0400 Study reveals anti-inflammatory power of Black Soldier Fly Larvae oil in inflammatory-related conditions
褪黑激素通过调节蛋白质磷酸化增强长期记忆多项研究已经证明褪黑激素及其衍生物在动物模型中具有增强记忆的作用。还已知短期和长期记忆的形成都需要某些与记忆相关的蛋白质的磷酸化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Melatonin-enhances-long-term-memory-by-modulated-蛋白质-磷酸化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Melatonin-enhances-long-term-memory-by-modulated-蛋白质-磷酸化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a297bc67-0b04-4b4d-9d47-3a19a6fad914 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 21:10:56 -0400 Melatonin enhances long-term memory by modulating protein phosphorylation
